group_1.narration: Yachiyo got me and Kaede@out of that dangerous situation...
And just like she suggested,@we went back to see Mitama.

group_1.textLeft: Iroha! @I didn't expect to see you again so soon...
...And you've brought some friends with you!
My goodness, Yachiyo!@...And if it isn't Kaede!
What's the matter?@You seem pretty upset.

group_1.textRight: Have you seen Momoko and Rena?

group_1.textLeft: Momoko and Rena?@No, I haven't seen them.
Iroha's the only one who entered@the Labyrinth since I got here.

group_1.textRight: Which means they're still@in the Labyrinth somewhere...
Though I guess we can't say that for sure...

group_1.textLeft: We can't...? Why not...?

group_1.textRight: Endless Mirrors is a special Labyrinth.
There's no telling what could happen there...

group_1.textLeft: You're right...
...I...I just hope they're all right...

group_1.textRight: If Rena knew you were this worried about her…

group_1.textLeft: Hm? Oh, yeah...@...She'd be really mad, huh?

group_1.textRight: Then maybe you shouldn't worry about her.

group_1.textLeft: Good point!
They're probably fine!@I...I'll stop worrying about them!
Well... @That's one way to put her at ease, I guess...
Yeah?@What is it?
Go ahead?

group_1.textRight: Why is the Labyrinth here so@different from all the others?

group_1.textLeft: Well, you just get straight@to the point, don't you?

group_1.textRight: You're the one who said the Mirror@Witch wanted to prey on us...

group_1.textLeft: Yes.@I did say that.

group_1.textRight: We can enter and leave as we please,@but we don't know how and where it ends.
Why would a Witch create a @Labyrinth like this? It seems…off.

group_1.textLeft: Some Magical Girls never@make it back out, you know...
They can exit anytime they like...@But they want to know what's at the end.
So they keep going back...

group_1.textRight: ...We are on a mission to@destroy the Witches, after all...

group_1.textLeft: ...Exactly.@So we can't give up, or just ignore it.
That's what draws all the Magical Girls @here in the first place.

group_1.textRight: That's what makes this Witch@particularly vicious, in my mind.
I hope Momoko and Rena are okay...

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, that was out of line...@I didn't mean to upset you...
Err… Don't worry! It'll be all right.@It's Momoko and Rena, after all.
...You can't stand to just@sit here and wait, can you?
May I come with you, Kaede?
Yes! @I'll do everything I can to help you!
Well, Yachiyo?@What are you going to do?

group_1.textRight: Well I've come this far, so...@I'll go with you.

group_1.narration: And so we stepped@back into the Labyrinth...

group_1.textCenter: [chara:100100:lipSynch_0](What if we're playing right@into the Mirror Witch's hands...?)
